creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Silk rug with a design of five-clawed blue dragons on a dull yellow ground, with scattered clouds, and the Eteranl Sea motif at each end. Three borders the inner one of saw-tooth design; the middle one with conventionalized leaves and blossoms; the outer one of plain blue. Short fringed ends, overcast sides. Cotton warp, sehna knot.
title: Silk Rug
